hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #Double Defense# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Triple Giant Pot

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #4# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Bomb Bag#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Bug Bottle#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.
